Content: A commemorative ceremony was held at the Ampara Special Task Force Camp to commemorate STF officers who sacrificed their lives during the period of war. The ceremony was held under the patronage of Eastern Province DIG M.D.K.S. Kapila Jayasekera. Floral tributes were paid to the memorial built on behalf of the STF members. DIG in charge of Ampara – Batticaloe Nuwan Wedasinghe, Police Officers, Armed Forces officials and relatives of STF Officers who sacrificed their lives to the nation were present at the ceremony. An all night  Pirith Chanting ceremony and an Alms Giving to the Maha Sangha took place to coincide with the commemorative ceremony.
